text:
my @_nightsweekends idea!
is it useless? arguably, yes. no one will lug around a purpose built device when you can literally smell methane.
but the whole point is of the project is to learn hardware design, embedded development, and a shitload of more stuff. so here geos! https://t.co/Jg2IS612kj
